game_description: * Weapons & Private Matches update now available * Alvo is a unique competitive FPS designed specifically for virtual reality. Get ready for some of the most intense and thrilling combat in the VR FPS genre. **Finely Tuned Gameplay** Alvo is a finely-tuned cocktail of mechanics that will keep you addicted and coming back round after round. Unlike other VR shooters that aim for ultra-realism, Alvo focuses on a faster-paced gameplay, providing an unparalleled experience for VR shooter fans. Whether you're a beginner VR player or a seasoned trophy hunter, Alvo has something for everyone. **An Addictive Progression System** One of the standout features of Alvo is its addicting progression system. Players can unlock more and more equipment as they rank and level up, making every round feel like a victory. That combined with a robust leaderboard system, players can put their skills to the test on daily or weekly challenges, making Alvo a truly competitive VR shooter experience. **Massive Selection of Tactical Advantages** Alvo boasts a massive selection of killstreaks, perks, and weapons to give players the tactical advantage. With more being added in regular updates, players will always have something new to try. The game also offers a huge array of game modes, including co-op Zombies, Free For All, Team Deathmatch, Hardpoint, and Search & Destroy, providing endless hours of entertainment.
review_1: Updating my review. I bought it when it first came to quest and gave it 5 stars. I wish I could change it to 100 stars. I live in the middle of nowhere and have no friends IRL. Every other game base is too toxic to really make friends. Not Alvo! The community (which the devs are VERY active in) has become my entire social life. All us seasoned veterans are happy to help new players. When you buy Alvo, you're not just buying a game. You're buying a family! Community aside, this is STILL the best VR shooter EVER. It's the closest you'll get to COD. The controls are a bit strange at first, but it's VERY accessible for those with disabilities or coming to VR from flat screen. Devs are CONSTANTLY updating the game and adding new features, maps, guns, etc. We even have a team based league now. Not only is this game worth every penny, but it actually SAVES you $ because you'll never want to buy another game again!
